thread.title: Shanghai Masters: Nadal wins thriller as Karlovic ace machine jams

author: newsr.in
title: Shanghai Masters: Nadal wins thriller as Karlovic ace machine jams
text:
*Shanghai:* Rafael Nadal needed all his trademark grit and determination on Wednesday when he was taken to a third-set tie-break by towering ace king Ivo Karlovic in a dramatic opening match at the Shanghai Masters.
*Rafael Nadal*
After Novak Djokovic and Andy Murray safely went through, Nadal was in danger of following Roger ... Â»
